alert.note: Alert for Houston (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 10:18PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Winona and northwestern Houston Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1018 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Trempealeau, or 8 miles southeast of Winona, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dakota around 1035 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Witoka, Dresbach, Perkins, Wilson, Nodine, Ridgeway, County 9 And Sather Valley Road, Pickwick, Money Creek and New Hartford. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 250 and 275. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for west central Wisconsin. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until midnight CDT for southeastern Minnesota.
